mapper.insert: insert into users (id, user_number, user_name, user_role, user_sex, user_phone, user_email, user_idcard, user_password, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{userNumber}, #{userName}, #{userRole}, #{userSex}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userIdcard}, #{userPassword}, #{isDeleted});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users LEFT JOIN roles on users.user_role = roles.id where (users.user_number = #{userNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE users set user_name = #{userName}, user_role = #{userRole}, user_sex = #{userSex}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_idcard = #{userIdcard}, user_password = #{userPassword} WHERE user_number = #{userNumber}
